Name: BOUNDARY UNIT LEVEL INDICATOR
Explanation: THE MARKINGS THAT WILL BE PLACED ON A BOUNDARY USED TO DELINEATE AREAS OF RESPONSIBILITY BETWEEN UNITS.

Name: COMMAND LEVEL (NATO)
Explanation: HIERARCHICAL POSITION OF THE UNIT WITH REFERENCE TO THE NATO COMMAND STRUCTURE.

Name: UNIT ECHELON (NATIVE)
Explanation: NATIONAL TERM FOR THE LEVEL AT WHICH THE UNIT EXISTS IN ITS OWN COMMAND STRUCTURE.
